detailsData.title: Committed Representation
detailsData.content: We're committed to you and your case. We are committed to obtaining justice no matter the cost.

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our legal team brings extensive experience and a proven track record of success in workers' compensation, personal injury, and insurance disputes.

detailsData.title: Personalized Attention
detailsData.content: We provide personalized attention to each case, ensuring that you're not just another case number. Our focus is on your unique situation and needs.

detailsData.title: Aggressive Advocacy
detailsData.content: We fight aggressively against corporate America and insurance companies to ensure our clients receive the fair compensation they deserve.

address: 4600 S Ulster St, Suite 800, Denver, CO 80237
subHeading: Denver personal injury and accident lawyer
valueProp: At The Babcock Law Firm, we are dedicated to providing aggressive, high-quality legal representation for individuals and families needing a personal injury lawyer, insurance dispute lawyer, workers' compensation or accident attorney in Denver, Boulder, Aurora, Broomfield, Louisville, Lafayette, Golden, Thornton, Westminster and other Colorado cities. Our commitment to our clients and our passion for justice sets us apart.
openHours: Monday - Thursday: 7:00am to 6:00pm, Friday: Closed, Saturday - Sunday: Closed

testimonalData.text: I can highly recommend the Babcock Law firm. They were very attentive, answered all of my questions and then took care of everything. I had nothing to worry about except getting better. The results were far better than I had expected. Thanks to them, I can now get on with my life.
testimonalData.author: Jack

testimonalData.text: The Babcock Law firm handled my case with great expertise. They were very informative and helpful. They are a team that really care about their clients and fight to make sure their clients are treated very fairly. I would highly recommend them to any one in need of a workers' comp attorney.
testimonalData.author: Leon

testimonalData.text: The Babcock Law Firm did an outstanding job of representing me. I had never been involved in a work related injury case, so I had no idea what to expect. Mack and his staff did a great job of providing information and protecting my rights every step of the way...
testimonalData.author: JC
